items.title: Larry Ellison: The college dropout who built Oracle and made it to the billionaire chart
items.summary: Larry Ellison, the college dropout who co-founded Oracle and built a $276 billion fortune, has become the world's second-richest person, surpassing Bezos and Zuckerberg.

items.summary: Using Google Lens has greatly improved the user's travel experience, making it more convenient and efficient.

items.title: Pure Storage profits from all-flash, as-a-service and cloud focus
items.summary: Pure Storage is profiting from their focus on all-flash, as-a-service, and cloud solutions, evolving their offerings across various workloads and embracing cloud models in data management.

items.title: Conflict Con Carney
items.summary: Carney's ethics screen covering over 100 companies and details of his blind trust raises questions about potential conflicts of interest, prompting speculation about his truthfulness to Canadians.

items.title: Farewell Cafucas: Lucas Vázquez says goodbye to Real Madrid
items.summary: Lucas Vázquez is saying goodbye to Real Madrid after 10 seasons in the first team, with a tribute event organized by the club and Florentino Pérez. The event will take place at Ciudad Real Madrid at 1:00 p.m.

items.title: Tropical Storm Dexter Update: Spaghetti Models Show Louisiana Landfall
items.summary: Forecast models indicate that a disturbance crossing over Florida, with the potential to develop into Tropical Storm Dexter, could move towards Louisiana this week, showing the use of AI-generated voice in meteorology research.

items.title: Map Shows Where Xi Jinping Is More Popular Than Donald Trump
items.summary: Confidence in President Donald Trump and views of the United States have fallen among the world's major economies over the past year, while China and its leader, Xi Jinping, have risen slightly in popularity.

items.title: Heartbreak As Shelter Throws Adoption Event for Dog, but No One Turns Up
items.summary: Heartbreaking story of a dog named Flash celebrating his birthday in a shelter after no one showed up to his adoption event, despite waiting over 1,070 days.
